tooltip.signal: {"State": isValid(datum["State"]) ? datum["State"] : ""+datum["State"], "Representatives per 100K": format(datum["Representatives per 100K"], ""), "%-population": format(datum["%-population"], ""), "%-representatives": format(datum["%-representatives"], "")}

description.signal: "Representatives ⇶: " + (!isValid(datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K"]) || !isFinite(+datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K"]) ? "null" : format(datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K"], "") + " – " + format(datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K_end"], "")) + "; centroid_lat: " + (format(datum["centroid_lat"], "")) + "; centroid_lon: " + (format(datum["centroid_lon"], "")) + "; Representatives per 100K (binned): " + (!isValid(datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K"]) || !isFinite(+datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K"]) ? "null" : format(datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K"], "") + " – " + format(datum["bin_maxbins_4_Representatives per 100K_end"], "")) + "; State: " + (isValid(datum["State"]) ? datum["State"] : ""+datum["State"]) + "; Representatives per 100K: " + (format(datum["Representatives per 100K"], "")) + "; %-population: " + (format(datum["%-population"], "")) + "; %-representatives: " + (format(datum["%-representatives"], ""))
